attributes.action: Ban the importation of trophy hunting items into the U.K.
attributes.background: The importation of parts of endangered species of animals should be outlawed in a civilised society, there is no acceptable reason for such imports.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:  

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105504

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
